description: Poise provides discreet protection against bladder leakage with 3in1 protection that a period pad can't provide.Poise Super Pads for Bladder Leaks offer discreet protection against moderate bladder leakage. Providing additional coverage to period pads, they absorb bladder leaks commonly experienced when bending, lifting and exercising. Experience Poise 3 in 1 Bladder Protection to enjoy comfort, dryness and odour control.
